title: South Korea to launch $687m on-device AI chip project
description: The project seeks to reduce local reliance on foreign AI chipmakers.

title: AI Impact Summit Signals To World, India Is Serious About AI: Chandrika Krishnamurthy Tandon
description: India AI Impact Summit 2026 is set to host on February 16 to 20, providing an opportunity to actively engage in interesting collaborations and innovation.

title: AI demand fuels photonics-semiconductor convergence at APE 2026
description: As artificial intelligence workloads push traditional computing architectures to their limits, the photonics industry is emerging as a critical enabler of next-generation data center infrastructure. The third Asia Photonics Expo (APE 2026), which concluded on February 6, 2026, reflected this shift, bringing together more than 240 exhibitors and nine international pavilions to showcase how optical technologies are becoming increasingly intertwined with semiconductor manufacturing and high-performance computing systems.

title: FedEx's Raj Subramanian, Adobe's Shantanu Narayen to lead US CEO delegation to India AI Impact Summit
description: The USISPF is the “Official Partner” of the India AI Impact Summit scheduled for 16–20 February in New Delhi, deepening the AI ties between the US and India.
